definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: You have now created a map of possibilities.
sentences.chinese: 現在你已經創建了一個可能的腦圖。

sentences.english: It is also very easy to add new information on lines anywhere in the map.
sentences.chinese: 這樣非常易於添加新的信息到思維腦圖的分枝上。

sentences.english: Designed for Chinese speakers to learn English with mind maps.
sentences.chinese: 爲了華語人士設計的腦圖，學習英語。

sentences.english: Project planning and mind mapping are as easy and automatic as breathing to me.
sentences.chinese: 項目計劃和腦圖對我來說就象呼吸一樣自然。

sentences.english: Let's go further and use this map of the word 'apple'.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們更進一步的來使用這張蘋果腦圖。
